name: ai: Imitation
description:
‘Ordinance Fourteen declares all creation of artificial intelligence, the study thereof, and subsequent learning, exchange, and (but not limited to) the knowledge of such; the trafficking of such; and the informed and uninformed association thereof to be considered high treason, on penalty of life in prison, or death.'

 'If I choose my pain, I choose my freedom.'

Artificial intelligence is illegal. 

Your life is illegal.

Is humanity quantifiable?

You live- but at what cost? 

ai: Imitation is a game about humanity, creation, revenge and loss. 

In this game you play as an AI, made by a rogue group, the last survivor being the scientist, Dr Laurent Calais. You meet the artist, Estella, who teaches you about being human. 

Will you embrace humanity? 

Or will it turn from you? 

You play as an AI, and can romance one of two characters- Laurent (male), or Estella (female). 

This game references death and attack of a group of peoples (androids). 

This is a demo made for Nanoreno 2021. 

Not all art/music/script/code is final. 

Please let us know if you find any bugs, and give your opinions!

Enjoy!
